means: 难以置信的，似乎不合情理的，不太可能的

sentence.Network_en: It seems implausible that the projects would have gone ahead without her backing.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些项目没有得到她的支持就开始进行了，这似乎不合情理。

sentence.Network_en: Alternatives which are extremely implausible need not be discussed at all.
sentence.Network_cn: 尤其没有必要讨论那些令人难以置信的替代方案.

sentence.Network_en: I had to admit it sounded like an implausible excuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我得承认那听起来像是个难以叫人相信的借口。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... implant 注入；灌输 implausible 难以置信的 implement 工具，器具；v.实现，实施.
...im（不）＋plac（平静）＋able→不能平静的*同根词：placate（抚慰，平息）implausible adj. 难信的, 不象真实的implement n．工具，器具v．实现，实施*（*记）im（进入）＋ple（满）＋ment&#8.
职称英语（综合类）辅导讲议－词汇学习 ... effective 是“有效的”， implausible （不合情理的）， original （有新意的）。.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 毒手是多麽令人难以置信
PerfectNetExp.abs: ...书豪的贡献无庸置疑（indisputable）。洛杉矶时报也创了Lin- plausible一词，描述湖人惨遭林书豪毒手是多麽令人难以置信（implau…

list.abs: an interesting but implausible story ; often told as an excuse ., 有趣却难以置信的谎言 ; 通常用作借口.
he gave the teacher an implausible excuse ., 给了老师一个难以相信的借口.
Alternatives which are extremely implausible need not be discussed at all ., 尤其没有必要讨论那些令人难以置信的替代方案.
he gave the teacher an implausible excuse ., 给了老师一个难以相信的借口.

entry.tran: 难以置信的;不像真实的
entry.def: If you describe something as implausible, you believe that it is unlikely to be true.

example.ex: I had to admit it sounded like an implausible excuse...
example.tran: 我得承认那听起来像是个难以叫人相信的借口。

example.ex: It seems implausible that the projects would have gone ahead without her backing.
example.tran: 这些项目没有得到她的支持就开始进行了，这似乎不合情理。

means.word_mean: 1. having a quality that provokes disbelief;

auth_sentence.content: Instead, once again, the implausible became reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead, once again, the implausible became reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead, once again, the implausible became reality.

auth_sentence.content: It gave Bush what I call implausible deniability.
auth_sentence.res_content: It gave Bush what I call implausible deniability.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It gave Bush what I call implausible deniability.

auth_sentence.content: SMOGGM.htm  Look at this and see how implausible Intelligent Design is...
auth_sentence.res_content: SMOGGM.htm Look at this and see how implausible Intelligent Design is...
auth_sentence.res_content_con: SMOGGM.htm  Look at this and see how implausible Intelligent Design is...
